entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Fog patches. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
